column1: The Pit Room////Maybe the best BBQ inside the loop
column2: and gives the big three of Gatlins
column4: and Corkscrew a run for their money...oh and really no line when I came for lunch on a glorious early Sunday Afternoon.  Order up front
column5: and pay.  They even have a few good beers on tap.  512 Pecan Porter goes particularly well with some BBQ.  Some wood tables scattered about
column6: and some seating outside.  I heard that people will be able to order from the bar next door and right on over the BBQ will come (they might already be doing this).
